name: @usdn/usdn-contracts
description: Contracts for the USDN token and derivatives protocol
author: RA2 Tech

scripts.cov:html: forge coverage --report lcov --no-match-test "(FFI|Fork|Fuzz|invariant)" && genhtml -o .coverage lcov.info && open .coverage/index.html
scripts.exportAbi: forge build && ts-node ./script/exportAbi.ts -g '{Usdn.sol,UsdnProtocol/UsdnProtocol.sol,OracleMiddleware/OracleMiddleware.sol}' && tsup ./dist/abi/index.ts --format cjs --format esm --dts --sourcemap
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .coverage && rm -rf out && rm -rf lib && forge clean && npm i && forge install
